1467270.name: Beyond Enemy Lines - Vietnam
1467270.description:
Survive. Adapt. Overcome.

Experience the Vietnam War through the eyes of a stranded soldier, fighting to survive deep in the jungle after a helicopter crash. Cut off from HQ, you must find your own path back - alone or with your team.

SURVIVE BEHIND ENEMY LINES

Choose your approach - silent and precise or loud and destructive.
Plan ambushes, infiltrate villages, sabotage enemy camps, and fight through intense combat zones. Every decision counts in this unforgiving tactical sandbox.

PLAY YOUR WAY

  • Full campaign playable solo or in 4-player coop

  • Dynamic AI reacting to your tactics and noise

  • Open mission areas offering total freedom of approach

MULTIPLAYER & PROGRESSION

  • Engage in competitive PvP and Coop battles with vehicles and infantry

  • Cross-platform play with shared stats and unlocks

  • Earn weapons, attachments, and upgrades through progression

CREATE. SHARE. FIGHT.

  • Integrated Sandbox Editor - create and share your own missions

  • Fully supports Singleplayer, Coop, and PvP

  • Cross-platform UGC ensures all players can play together

Beyond Enemy Lines - Vietnam delivers a raw and immersive tactical shooter that blends freedom, creativity, and cooperation in the Vietnam War setting.
1467270.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 芬兰语, 日语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 瑞典语, 土耳其语, 匈牙利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
